java/liquibase/util/ISODateFormat.java

00001 package liquibase.util;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.sql.ComputedDateValue;
00004 
00005 import java.sql.Time;
00006 import java.text.ParseException;
00007 import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
00008 import java.util.Date;
00009 
00010 public class ISODateFormat {
00011 
00012     private SimpleDateFormat dateTimeFormat = new SimpleDateFormat(DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING);
00013     private SimpleDateFormat dateTimeFormatWithDecimal = new SimpleDateFormat(DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING_WITH_DECIMAL);
00014     private SimpleDateFormat timeFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm:ss");
00015     private SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd");
00016     private static final String DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss";
00017     private static final String DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING_WITH_DECIMAL = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.S";
00018 
00019 
00020     public String format(java.sql.Date date) {
00021         return dateFormat.format(date);
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String format(java.sql.Time date) {
00025         return timeFormat.format(date);
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String format(java.sql.Timestamp date) {
00029         return dateTimeFormatWithDecimal.format(date);
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String format(Date date) {
00033         if (date instanceof ComputedDateValue) {
00034             return date.toString();
00035         } else if (date instanceof java.sql.Date) {
00036             return format(((java.sql.Date) date));
00037         } else if (date instanceof Time) {
00038             return format(((java.sql.Time) date));
00039         } else if (date instanceof java.sql.Timestamp) {
00040             return format(((java.sql.Timestamp) date));
00041         } else {
00042             throw new RuntimeException("Unknown type: "+date.getClass().getName());
00043         }
00044     }
00045 
00046     public Date parse(String dateAsString) throws ParseException {
00047         SimpleDateFormat dateTimeFormat = this.dateTimeFormat;
00048         String DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING = ISODateFormat.DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING;
00049 
00050         if (dateAsString.indexOf('.') >= 0) {
00051             dateTimeFormat = this.dateTimeFormatWithDecimal;
00052             DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING = ISODateFormat.DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING_WITH_DECIMAL;
00053         }
00054 
00055 
00056         if (dateAsString.length() >= DATE_TIME_FORMAT_STRING.length()-2) { //subtract 2 to not count the 's
00057             return new java.sql.Timestamp(dateTimeFormat.parse(dateAsString).getTime());
00058         } else {
00059             if (dateAsString.indexOf(':') > 0) {
00060                 return new java.sql.Time(timeFormat.parse(dateAsString).getTime());
00061             } else {
00062                 return new java.sql.Date(dateFormat.parse(dateAsString).getTime());
00063             }
00064         }
00065     }
00066 }
